attributes.action: Compulsory Nutritional Information on all Alcohol Products
attributes.additional_details:
- Nutritional Information to be displayed on all alcohol products.

- It is not widely realised that one pint of 5% lager contains 170 calories (Source: NHS).
   - The alcohol industry relies on this lack of education/information, and should not be allowed to do so any longer.

- Binge drinking is a huge health problem in this country. I am a student and as guilty as many others, but there are huge repercussions of drinking alcohol that we should be actively educated on immediately.

This is fundamental to the health and well-being of a huge portion of the population, and a fundamental action which should be taken to improve public awareness of the regulated substances which are being ingested, often on a daily basis.
